qrcode-generator.title: QR Code generator
qrcode-generator.description: Generate and download a QR code for a URL (or just plain text), and customize the background and foreground colors.
qrcode-generator.cardDescription: Generate customizable QR codes for URLs or text with adjustable colors and error correction levels.
qrcode-generator.yourLinkOrText: Enter URL or text to encode...
qrcode-generator.errorResistanceHint: Higher levels allow more damage tolerance but increase QR code density.
qrcode-generator.emptyPreview: Enter text to generate QR code
